chapter-1.title: Introduction to Physical AI
chapter-1.description: This chapter introduces the fundamental concepts of Physical AI, exploring the intersection of artificial intelligence and the physical world. We will delve into the history of AI, from its early theoretical beginnings to the development of embodied agents that can perceive, reason, and act in real-world environments.

chapter-10.title: Conclusion
chapter-10.description: This chapter summarizes the key themes of the book and offers some concluding thoughts on the future of Physical AI and humanoid robotics.

chapter-2.title: Sensing and Perception
chapter-2.description: This chapter focuses on the sensory systems of Physical AI. We will explore various sensor modalities, including vision, touch, and hearing, and discuss the algorithms and techniques used to process sensory data into meaningful representations of the environment.

chapter-3.title: Actuation and Control
chapter-3.description: This chapter delves into the "muscles" of Physical AI. We'll examine different types of actuators and control systems that enable physical interaction with the world, from simple movements to complex manipulation tasks.

chapter-4.title: Motion Planning and Navigation
chapter-4.description: This chapter explores how Physical AI systems plan their movements and navigate through complex environments. We will cover algorithms for pathfinding, obstacle avoidance, and simultaneous localization and mapping (SLAM).

chapter-5.title: Humanoid Robotics
chapter-5.description: This chapter provides a comprehensive overview of humanoid robotics. We will explore the history of humanoid robots, their design and construction, and the challenges of creating machines that mimic human form and function.

chapter-6.title: Robot Learning
chapter-6.description: This chapter explores how robots can learn from experience. We will delve into reinforcement learning, imitation learning, and other machine learning techniques that enable robots to acquire new skills and adapt to new situations.

chapter-7.title: AI Ethics and Safety
chapter-7.description: This chapter addresses the ethical and safety considerations of Physical AI. We will discuss the potential risks and benefits of advanced AI and robotics, and explore frameworks for ensuring that these technologies are developed and used responsibly.

chapter-8.title: Applications of Physical AI
chapter-8.description: This chapter showcases the wide range of applications for Physical AI. We will explore how these technologies are being used in fields such as manufacturing, healthcare, logistics, and exploration.

chapter-9.title: The Future of Physical AI
chapter-9.description: This chapter looks to the future of Physical AI. We will discuss the latest research trends and speculate on the long-term impact of these technologies on society.
